LicenseCategories.title: Choose your <primary>dream</primary> driving license
LicenseCategories.subtitle: Choose a course from our wide range to best suit your time and individual needs.

leftCategories.title: Buses
leftCategories.description: The course prepares for driving buses with more than 8 passengers, includes theoretical preparation and practical driving in real traffic. A condition is meeting the legal age and health fitness for obtaining a driving license.

leftCategories.title: Truck combinations
leftCategories.description: Group C training teaches how to drive vehicles over 3.5 tons, the C+E extension adds driving with a trailer over 750 kg; includes theory, maneuvering and driving in real traffic.

centerLeftCategory.title: Motorcycles
centerLeftCategory.description: Complete training for motorcycle groups AM, A1, A2 and A with theoretical and practical preparation. Supplementary exams and conditional rides available.

centerRightCategory.title: Automobiles
centerRightCategory.description: Authorizes driving vehicles up to 3.5 tons with max. 8 passengers, including trailers up to 750 kg. Also tractors and work machines up to 3.5 tons.

rightCategories.title: Tractors
rightCategories.description: The Group T course prepares you for driving self-propelled working machines with a maximum speed of 40 km/h, including off-road and road driving. It requires reaching the specified age, medical fitness, and successful completion of exams.

rightCategories.title: Driver training
rightCategories.description: Professional training for professional drivers includes basic and periodic courses focused on safety, legislation, and operation of a digital tachograph. It is intended for holders of the relevant driving license and requires valid medical fitness according to regulations.

StepsToGettingALicense.title: Steps to getting a <primary>driver's license</primary>
StepsToGettingALicense.perex: Follow the steps and successfully obtain your driving licence with STAR Driving School.

steps.title: Fill in the application
steps.description: Fill in the application form with your personal details and we will offer you a suitable date and form of tuition.

steps.title: Theory & eTests
steps.description: Learn the rules of the road and practice them with eTests to prepare for your theory test.

steps.title: Practical driving
steps.description: Gain driving experience under the supervision of professional instructors in real traffic and complex traffic situations.

steps.title: Exams & License
steps.description: After completing theory and driving, we will register you for the test. Once you pass, you'll get your driver's license and can set off to pursue your dreams.

BetterExperience.title: Why choose <primary>us?</primary>
BetterExperience.description: With us, you will not only learn to drive safely and confidently, but you will also enjoy the whole process. Thanks to clear instruction, patient instructors, and a supportive environment, you will master every step without unnecessary stress. We believe that quality preparation can also be a pleasant experience.

features.title: Individual approach to everyone
features.description: We realize that every student is different - some feel more confident behind the wheel, others need more time and support. We will adapt to your pace and find a teaching method that suits you. Our goal is not just to prepare you for exams, but mainly for real traffic.

features.title: Experienced and patient instructors
features.description: Our team consists of professionals with many years of experience who can remain calm in any situation. They explain everything clearly, without unnecessary stress or pressure. Thanks to their approach, you will feel safe and confident during training.

features.title: Modern theory and online tools
features.description: You can complete the theoretical part comfortably from home. You have access to online e-tests and well-organized study materials that will effectively prepare you for exams.

features.title: Practical driving without stress
features.description: From the very first moment behind the wheel to the final exam, you will practice in real traffic conditions with emphasis on your comfort and safety. The goal is to gain not only skills but also the confidence needed for independent driving.

features.title: High success rate in exams
features.description: Our thorough preparation is reflected in the results. The vast majority of our students successfully pass their exams on the first attempt. We know what to focus on and how to support you to get your license as quickly as possible.

ContactAndLocation.mainHeading: We will pick you up on your way to getting a driver's license
ContactAndLocation.description: You don't have to worry about how you'll get to your lessons - we'll pick you up directly at a place that suits you. Choose from our pick-up points in Bílina and its surroundings and let us pamper you:
ContactAndLocation.contactSubheading: LEAVE US YOUR CONTACT AND WE WILL GET BACK TO YOU

Footer.companyDescription: Professional driving school with long tradition in Bílina and surroundings. We specialize in quality driving instruction for all vehicle categories with an individual approach to each student.

Hero.description: We will teach you to drive from scratch, in a friendly team and at a fair price. At Autoškola Star, we will prepare you for final exams, whether you are a complete beginner or a professional driver.
Hero.line3Top: Driving school that prepares you for everything.
Hero.line3Bottom: Without stress. With confidence. With instructors who stand by your side.

B.title: Category B Driving License
B.description: Get your Category B driving license and open the path to freedom and independence. Our comprehensive training combines modern theoretical approaches with practical driving in real traffic to prepare you for safe and confident driving.

sedan.title: Škoda Octavia
sedan.description: Spacious sedan with excellent visibility and modern equipment for comfortable training.

hatchback.title: Ford Focus
hatchback.description: Compact hatchback with responsive steering and advanced safety systems.

suv.title: Škoda Karoq
suv.description: Higher seating position and great road view for confident driving in city traffic.

A.title: Category A Driving License
A.description: Get authorization to ride motorcycles without power restrictions. Our professional training prepares you for safe operation of powerful motorcycles in urban and highway traffic.

sport.title: Honda CB 650F
sport.description: Sport motorcycle with balanced riding characteristics, ideal for advanced technique training.

naked.title: Yamaha MT-07
naked.description: Naked bike with excellent handling and ergonomics for comfortable training.

touring.title: BMW F 800 GT
touring.description: Touring motorcycle with advanced safety systems for highway training.

C.title: Category C Driving License
C.description: Group C training teaches how to drive vehicles over 3.5 tons, the C+E extension adds driving with a trailer over 750 kg; includes theory, maneuvering and driving in real traffic.

medium.title: MAN TGL 8.180
medium.description: Medium-duty truck with modern equipment for basic training.

box.title: Iveco Eurocargo
box.description: Box truck ideal for cargo handling and parking training.

flatbed.title: Mercedes Atego
flatbed.description: Flatbed truck with hydraulic crane for loading and cargo securing training.

D.title: Category D Driving License
D.description: The course prepares for driving buses with more than 8 passengers, includes theoretical preparation and practical driving in real traffic. A condition is meeting the legal age and health fitness for obtaining a driving license.

city.title: Mercedes Citaro
city.description: City bus with low-floor design for urban traffic training.

intercity.title: Iveco Crossway
intercity.description: Intercity bus with comfortable equipment for long-distance training.

minibus.title: Mercedes Sprinter
minibus.description: Minibus for basic training and first passenger transport experience.

T.title: Category T Driving License
T.description: The Group T course prepares you for driving tractors self-propelled working machines with a maximum speed of 40 km/h, including off-road and road driving. It requires reaching the specified age, medical fitness, and successful completion of exams.

agricultural.title: John Deere 6120M
agricultural.description: Modern agricultural tractor with GPS navigation and automatic steering.

construction.title: Case IH Puma
construction.description: Universal tractor suitable for agricultural and construction work.

forestry.title: Fendt 724 Vario
forestry.description: Forest tractor with power steering for heavy terrain work.

DriverTrainingPage.title: Driver Training
DriverTrainingPage.description: Professional training for commercial drivers and employee drivers. Ensure road safety and meet legal requirements with our certified training programs.

referent.label: Employee Driver Training
referent.description: For employees driving company vehicles up to 3.5t. Legal requirement under labor law. Repeat every 2 years.

professional.label: Professional Driver Training
professional.description: For professional drivers - basic and periodic courses focused on safety and legislation.

items.title: Traffic Rules
items.description: Current legislation and traffic regulations valid in Czech Republic.

items.title: Safe Driving Principles
items.description: Defensive driving techniques and traffic accident prevention.

items.title: Crisis Management
items.description: Procedures for accidents and emergency situations on the road.

items.title: Mandatory Vehicle Equipment
items.description: Familiarization with mandatory equipment and its proper use.

items.title: Medical Fitness
items.description: Importance of physical and mental condition for safe driving.

items.title: Digital Tachograph
items.description: Operation and use of digital tachograph for professional drivers.

items.0: Reduced risk of traffic accidents and property damage
items.2: Enhanced safety culture in the company

items.0: Increased safety and confidence behind the wheel
